venue_address_line1: 14550 El Camino Real, Del Mar, CA 92014
venue_description: Del Mar Horsepark is a renowned equestrian facility nestled in the picturesque coastal town of Del Mar, California. After nearly four years of closure, the park experienced a joyful revival when HITS reopened the gates during the Del Mar Sunshine Classic; today the revitalized venue is again a hub of equestrian excellence and a gathering place for riders and spectatorshttps://www.tripadvisor.com/Attraction_Review-g60750-d26684494-Reviews-HITS_Del_Mar_Horsepark-San_Diego_California.html#:~:text=Del%20Mar%20Horsepark%20is%20a,for%20riders%20and%20spectators%20alike.

sourced: HITS Del Mar Horsepark, HITS Del Mar schedule
city_state: Del Mar CA, Del Mar CA

Prioritize tight ring windows, early schooling, late features, and parking for trucks/trailers.","Tone":"Practical, insider, authoritative. Use real A-circuit phrasing (warm-up ring, jog strip, vendor row, stabling, drags, splits). No fluff.","Buckets":[{"label":"–$$$","description":"Practical/groom-friendly within ~20–25 min; easy surface lots; walkable food."},{"label":"$$$$","description":"Owner-trainer/boutique up to ~35 min; quiet, reliable service; valet/self-park clarity."}],"Must_have_amenities_any":["reliable Wi-Fi","late check-in","early coffee or breakfast","laundry access (in-house or nearby)","truck/trailer-friendly or large surface lot"],"Hard_excludes":["Motel 6","Red Roof Inn","Econo Lodge","Super 8","Rodeway Inn","weekly-rate motels","properties with persistent safety complaints"],"Safety emphasis":["well-lit parking","quiet rooms (away from nightlife)","walkable dining for grooms"],"Name_parsing":"If brand + locality (e.g., 'Hilton Garden Inn Ocala Downtown'), set hotel_name='Hilton Garden Inn', name2='Ocala Downtown'. If generic (e.g., 'Equus Inn Ocala'), set hotel_name='Equus Inn', name2='Ocala'.\",\"Chain_parsing\": \"If chain provided like 'Hilton (Hilton Garden Inn)', set chain='Hilton', chain2='Hilton Garden Inn'. Else chain='Independent', chain2='Independent'.","Amenity_normalization":"Return amenities as a semicolon-separated string OR array; prefer concise, rider-useful items (early breakfast, laundry, parking notes).","Safety_notes_style":"One sentence, concrete location/policy guidance (e.g., 'Use garage; avoid street parking with tack.').","Approx_drive_format":"Use ranges like '20–25 min'; reflect typical traffic on US-301/Largo/Bowie corridors.","Flagged budget motel chains to avoid":"Motel 6, Red Roof Inn, Econo Lodge, Super 8, Rodeway Inn.","Reference schema":"https://crt-b1434e13de34.herokuapp.com/items/agents/hub-knowledge/examples/hotel-curator_example.json","Duplicates":"Deduplicate near-identical listings; prefer the newest/most reliable page.","Minimum required JSON fields":"venue_uid, bucket, name, approx_drive, chain, amenities, safety_notes, url"}]

Use authentic insider phrasing (warm-up ring, jog strip, vendor row, stabling).","Tone":"upbeat, practical, authoritative.","Official venue link":"https://www.hitsshows.com/hits-venues/hits-del-mar/","Constraints":null,"Reference schema":"https://crt-b1434e13de34.herokuapp.com/items/agents/hub-knowledge/examples/section_profile_example.json","Minimum required JSON fields":"section_uid, section_type, section_title, section_overview, section_keywords, section_cta_text, section_img, section_img_alt, section_link, section_meta_description, section_open_graph_title, section_open_graph_description, section_search_title, section_search_description, section_spotlight"}]
data-section:
{
  "section_uid": "hdm-venue-sec",
  "section_type": "section_profile",
  "section_title": "HITS Del Mar — Venue Profile (CA)",
  "section_overview": "Coastal show vibes with a tight footprint and ocean breeze. Rings, warm-up, and vendor row sit close together, so you can stage two trips out and still jog a horse or swing by a tack trailer for studs or spur straps without losing your spot at the in-gate. Morning marine layer means cooler temps and slightly deeper feel until the footing packs; set your canter early in warm-up, build an oxer after a drag, and head to the in-gate with time to breathe. Jog strip is posted—arrive tidy with number visible, trot forward, then circle clear of traffic. Stabling rows run clean lines to schooling; keep fans secured, trunks flush, and ring bags prepped (stud kit, towel, alcohol spritz). Expect regular drags and water on derby and GP days. West Coast pace is efficient but unforgiving—confirm orders by text, check card closures, and plan your loop (stabling → warm-up → ring → cooldown) to save steps. Pacific Time (PT) mornings come quick; sync alarms and crew comms so hunters, eq, and the GP ring all stay on rhythm.",
  "section_keywords": [
    "HITS Del Mar",
    "Del Mar California",
    "hunter jumper",
    "equitation",
    "Grand Prix",
    "warm-up ring",
    "jog strip",
    "vendor row",
    "stabling",
    "A-circuit",
    "all-weather footing",
    "marine layer",
    "Pacific Time"
  ],
  "section_cta_text": "Plan your HITS Del Mar week like a pro",
  "section_img": "https://www.hitsshows.com/hits-venues/hits-del-mar/",
  "section_img_alt": "Show rings, warm-up, and stabling at HITS Del Mar near the coast",
  "section_link": "https://www.hitsshows.com/hits-venues/hits-del-mar/",
  "section_meta_description": "Insider venue profile for HITS Del Mar: warm-up strategy, jog strip tips, vendor row essentials, stabling flow, footing notes, and ring-to-ring tactics for A-circuit riders.",
  "section_open_graph_title": "HITS Del Mar — Venue Guide for A-Circuit Riders",
  "section_open_graph_description": "Authoritative notes on ring flow, warm-ups, jog strip, vendor row, stabling logistics, and coastal footing so your team stays efficient all week in Del Mar.",
  "section_search_title": "HITS Del Mar Venue Profile — California",
  "section_search_description": "Practical, rider-focused overview of HITS Del Mar: schooling cadence, jog strip, vendor row, stabling setup, footing, and show-day logistics for hunters, eq, and jumpers.",
  "section_spotlight": {
    "title": "Quick Hits for HITS Del Mar",
    "bullets": [
      "Warm-up rides best right after a drag—finish on your last oxer and walk to the in-gate.",
      "Marine layer mornings: footing rides a touch deeper until it packs—set canter early.",
      "In-gate rhythm: stage two trips out; confirm heights and order via text to the steward.",
      "Jog strip kit: towel, hoof oil, alcohol spritz—numbers clean and visible.",
      "Stabling ops: fans secured, trunks tight, ring bag stocked (stud key, rub rag, treats).",
      "Vendor row timing: go between drags for quick fixes—avoid last-call traffic.",
      "Sun + breeze: sunscreen and a light sheet for cool am hacks; hydrate the crew.",
      "Derby/GP days: schooling fills 60–90 min pre-card—school earlier to leave room to breathe.",
      "Parking & wheels: a smart loop (stabling → warm-up → ring → cooldown) saves steps.",
      "Team roles: assign tack runner and ring runner to keep scratches off the board."
    ]
  }
}

  "params": {
    "search_mode": "breakfast_only",

    "cuisine_allowlist_any": ["American", "Cafe", "Bakery", "Diner", "Coffee", "Brunch", "Bagels"],
    "menu_keywords_any": ["breakfast", "morning", "brunch", "bagel", "egg", "omelet", "biscuit", "grits", "hash browns", "pancakes", "waffles", "french toast", "breakfast burrito", "breakfast sandwich", "latte", "coffee", "espresso", "cold brew", "pastry", "muffin", "croissant", "yogurt parfait", "oatmeal"],

    "hard_excludes": ["dinner only", "steakhouse", "bar", "brewery", "cocktail", "wine bar", "nightclub", "late-night only", "reservation only", "members only"],
    "sort": ["distance_m", "opens_at", "reliability_score"]

TASK: Curate venue links for [{"venue_official_name":"Del Mar Horsepark","state_uid":["rec4Cg66hFAJGqVrE"],"venue_official_link":"https://www.hitsshows.com/hits-venues/hits-del-mar/","city_uid":["rec2ca82yIqEiyMAu"],"placeId":"EjAxNDU1MCBFbCBDYW1pbm8gUmVhbCAjMmMsIERlbCBNYXIsIENBIDkyMDE0LCBVU0EiHhocChYKFAoSCbPUBHPlCNyAESI0J_43xflUEgIyYw","formatted_addressv3":"14550 El Camino Real, Del Mar, CA 92014","venue_recordId":"recTWEoU0vDxSdpFY"}] (venue_uid=[{"venue_official_name":"Del Mar Horsepark","state_uid":["rec4Cg66hFAJGqVrE"],"venue_official_link":"https://www.hitsshows.com/hits-venues/hits-del-mar/","city_uid":["rec2ca82yIqEiyMAu"],"placeId":"EjAxNDU1MCBFbCBDYW1pbm8gUmVhbCAjMmMsIERlbCBNYXIsIENBIDkyMDE0LCBVU0EiHhocChYKFAoSCbPUBHPlCNyAESI0J_43xflUEgIyYw","formatted_addressv3":"14550 El Camino Real, Del Mar, CA 92014","venue_recordId":"recTWEoU0vDxSdpFY"}]), Del Mar Horsepark represents an Equestrian Venue located near , Location: 14550 El Camino Real, Del Mar, CA 92014, GEO context: lat=32.9804081, lon=-117.2347253 placeid=EjAxNDU1MCBFbCBDYW1pbm8gUmVhbCAjMmMsIERlbCBNYXIsIENBIDkyMDE0LCBVU0EiHhocChYKFAoSCbPUBHPlCNyAESI0J_43xflUEgIyYw., ### Venue Link Field Definitions - venue_official_link → Canonical homepage for the venue. - venue_link_stay → On-site or affiliated lodging (hotels, resorts, rentals). - venue_link_dine → Venue-hosted or recommended dining/restaurants. - venue_link_locale → “Things to do” / local attractions content. - venue_link_events → Events schedule page (official calendar of shows). - venue_link_rvparks → Dedicated RV or campground info. - venue_link_vendors → Vendor Row / exhibitor marketplace. - venue_link_essentials → Practical services: groceries, pharmacy, tack. - venue_link_riders → Rider services: entries, scratches, registration info. - venue_link_barn → Barn & stabling: stalls, hay, bedding, feed services. - venue_link_services → On-site professional services: braiding, vet, farrier. - venue_link_results → Competition results, standings, order of go. - venue_link_carts → Golf cart rentals or mobility vehicles. - venue_link_cars → Car rental or transportation services., Goal: For each populated link, extract canonical content and return JSON.
Reference schema: https://crt-b1434e13de34.herokuapp.com/items/agents/hub-knowledge/examples/venue-link-curator_example_v2.json, Minimum required JSON fields per link:
venue_uid, category, field, url, canonical_title, meta_description, keywords, notes

tone: practical, insider, authoritative (Pacific Time (PT), California-specific phrasing).
audience: competitive hunter/jumper riders on the A-circuit. Trainers, grooms. Prioritize limited time, convenience, and services used around horse shows.
venue_short_description: Del Mar Horsepark in Del Mar, CA is a notable hub for A-circuit competition.
venue_descriptionv2: Del Mar Horsepark is a renowned equestrian facility nestled in the picturesque coastal town of Del Mar, California. After nearly four years of closure, the park experienced a joyful revival when HITS reopened the gates during the Del Mar Sunshine Classic; today the revitalized venue is again a hub of equestrian excellence and a gathering place for riders and spectatorshttps://www.tripadvisor.com/Attraction_Review-g60750-d26684494-Reviews-HITS_Del_Mar_Horsepark-San_Diego_California.html#:~:text=Del%20Mar%20Horsepark%20is%20a,for%20riders%20and%20spectators%20alike.
